title: Battery Technology
content: Model Aircraft Battery Technology # This will be a page about batteries and some of my own learning over the past several months.

title: Coaching Tips & Tricks
content: Hockey Coaching Tips & Tricks # Coaching youth hockey is a rewarding experience, but it comes with a lot of “to do” items and other things coaches much remember. This is a collection of my learning for my own memory, but also so it might be useful for other newbies.

title: USA Hockey Registration
content:
USA Hockey Registration # USA Hockey registration is a cumbersome, sometimes confusing mess. This is a a quick doc to help address some of the more confusing parts of the process each year.
Yearly Requirements # Coaching credentials must be kept up-to-date, but not every item is required yearly.
